definition: the act or fact of attending something or someone
examples: Attendance at the meeting is mandatory.

definition: the persons or number of persons attending something, an account of persons attending
examples: Attendance at the soccer games has been increasing.
The teacher took attendance [=made a record of who was present] before starting class.

definition: the number of times a person attends
examples: a student who has perfect attendance [=a student who has been present at every class]
